items.sentence: Tom didn't seem to be as afraid as Mary seemed to be.
I had the impression that Tom knew what was going on.
Tom didn't go because Mary said that he shouldn't go.
If you're going to do that, make sure you're careful.
As soon as Tom got Mary alone, he started kissing her.
Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.
Be careful what you wish for. It just might come true.
It looked like Tom wanted to say more, but he didn\'t.
It looks like we\'re going to be staying here tonight.
I\'d like a copy of that document as soon as possible.
I\'d like to talk to you when you have some free time.
I\'ll bet you three hundred dollars that Tom will win.
I\'m aware that every choice I make has a consequence.
I\'m looking forward to seeing you in a wedding dress.
Tom isn\'t really interested. He\'s just being polite.
Let\'s tell Tom we\'re too tired to come over tonight.
Tom hopes he won\'t be eating leftovers again tonight.
Tom is already here, but Mary hasn\'t gotten here yet.
When Tom arrives in Boston, I\'ll call you right away.
When you can\'t do what you want, you do what you can.
